short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Awesome button to duplicate the current tab in a new Chrome window (or tab).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This button duplicates the currently focused Chrome tab. 

There is an options page to choose whether the duplication occurs in a new tab or in new window option.
